casebody.data:
Thursday, September 23, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

99-1439. Thomas v. Vesper.

Ashland App. No. 99COA01291. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of all proceedings in trial court including discovery,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay be, and hereby is, denied.

Douglas, J., concurs and would also dismiss the appeal. P.E. Sweeney, J., dissents.
